mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, ROLE, PW, EMAIL, NAME, GENDER, MOBILE, PW_MODIFY_DT, SIGNUP_DT, DELETED_DT FROM USER_T WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT U.USER_NO, U.USER_ID, U.NAME, U.EMAIL, U.SIGNUP_DT, U.DELETED_DT,
COUNT(DISTINCT B.BOARD_NO) AS BOARD_CNT, COUNT(DISTINCT C.COMMENT_NO) AS COMMENT_CNT FROM USER_T U LEFT JOIN BOARD_T B ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO LEFT JOIN COMMENT_T C ON U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO GROUP BY U.USER_NO, U.USER_ID, U.NAME, U.EMAIL, U.SIGNUP_DT, U.DELETED_DT ORDER BY U.SIGNUP_DT DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE USER_T SET DELETED_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHERE USER_ID = -1
#{userNo}

UPDATE USER_T SET DELETED_DT = NULL WHERE USER_ID = -1

mapper.select: SELECT R.REPORT_NO, R.REPORTER_NO, R.USER_NO, R.BOARD_NO, R.TITLE, R.CONTENTS, R.CREATE_DT FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN BOARD_T B ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO INNER JOIN REPORT_T R ON B.BOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo}
